class_notes:
We will meet once a week on Wednesdays at 12:15pm for the faculty colloquium (one hour) and for another hour afterward. Grading is on a pass/fail basis for all students. There is no course book, the readings change depending on the speakers and the topics that the students want to cover. Students will submit a reaction paper of 2 to 3 pages double-spaced commenting on the faculty colloquium articles.
Students must submit the pre-selection form to be considered for a spot in the colloquium.
course_description: This class is for students interested in the art of writing, particularly scholarly writing, and for those interested in learning more about legal academic careers. In coordination with the weekly faculty colloquium series, students will examine successful (and not so successful) approaches to legal scholarship. Students will also receive information about publication procedures in the legal academy and about the legal academic job market.
